output_list.reason: The balanceOf function does not check if the address has been created before returning the balance. This could lead to incorrect results if the address has not been created yet.
The transfer function does not check if the recipient has been created before transferring the balance. This could lead to incorrect results if the recipient has not been created yet.

The transferFrom function does not check if the sender and recipient have been created before transferring the balance. This could lead to incorrect results if the sender or recipient has not been created yet.
The burn function does not check if the sender has been created before burning the balance. This could lead to incorrect results if the sender has not been created yet.
The burnFrom function does not check if the sender and burner have been created before burning the balance. This could lead to incorrect results if the sender or burner has not been created yet.
